title: Snapchat will finally allow you to change your embarrassing username from years ago
content:
Snapchat — the platform loved by teenagers and young adults alike — has existed for years. It’s an ideal way to share expiring moments with those you care about. To keep you active and encourage you to use the service more, Snapchat even offers Streaks as a motivator to communicate with your contacts every day.

The post Snapchat will finally allow you to change your embarrassing username from years ago appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Snapchat will finally allow you to change your username starting February 23. You will be able to change it once per year only, though.
